website_summaries.verdict: Everything you need to provide water and food for your pups, no matter where you are.
pros: Container effectively holds water or food while the dual lids work as serving bowls
The container has an airtight seal and is made from durable plastic
Large handle is easy to hold and can be used to clip the container to a bag
cons: Containers are not dishwasher safe, must be hand washed

customer_reviews.title: A gem!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ahead of a weekend away with my dog, this fit everything we needed, plus snacks, etc. (divided up with little baggies, etc. The handle is great for carrying and keeping everything neatly together, though I wouldn't rely on it to hang outside a backpack or something while hiking, as other reviews have noted it's a little flimsy. The bowls on either end are fabulous, and means that I don't need to pack additional bowls. All in all, a compact travel idea, a nicely sealed container when the bowls are in use, due to the separate lid, and when not travelling, acts as an additional food storage canister. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LemonHoneyTea

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I didn't like it because it is larger than I thought; and I wanted something to keep in my car for small trips. Our dog is a beagle mix and eats less than a cup a day. This will hold something like 10 cups (not verified). Since having it, however, I really like it! It's great for long distance trips! It's compact, with the top and bottom blue dishes fitting perfectly over the food container. The handle is easy to remove and put back on, and it's easy to clean. I'd like to see them come out with a container that is "split" where water can be stored in top part and food in the bottom part!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Douglass

customer_reviews.title: NOT Top-Rack Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: In the description, it lists the container as food grade BPA free high density high grade plastic, but it melts and shrinks, and isn't top rack dishwasher safe. Lasted one outing, only until we tried to clean it. The clear inner container needs to be made of safer, more durable plastic. The outer bowls smelled of plastic, and our dog wouldn't eat or drink from them. The idea is good, the size is good, the materials are poor. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: s.p.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect for what I needed. We like to take weekend trips with the dogs and this is so much better than carrying several glad containers. I can fit 3 cups of small breed dry food and 3 bags of "moist and meaty" all at once in the storage part. The bowls are large enough that dogs can share and the water will last a while. It did have a strong smell but I washed it really well with soap and let it air dry, the smell is now gone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I work from my mom's house every day so she can watch my daughter and so naturally when I got a puppy I decided to take her with me too. This makes traveling back and forth so easy! I can't say enough great things about the vittles vault! The only thing I'd change is that I saw it in pink in one of the pictures but can't find a pink one. I settled for blue but it's still fantastic. I'd imagine taking this camping or on vacation would be excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Misti MoonshineTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Gamma2 Vittles Vault! It actually came even larger than I thought it would be which I'm happy about. Good quality, good price, large size and fast shipping. I bought 3 of them for my 3 fur kids and now I'm going to order another one for my grandpup as a Christmas gift and fill it with some of his favorite treats. I totally recommend this item, residually if you travel alot with your fur kids like my family does.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The product is just okay. It matches its description, but having other vittle vaults products, I expected a more robust container. This one deflects easily in my hand, and I suspect that my large retriever could easily destroy it given the opportunity. It's not bad, but it's not up to the standard I have come to expect from Vittles Vault.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleB

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for To-Go-Bag
customer_reviews.text: As I get ready for another hurricane season I realized that not only does my To-Go-Bag need to be ready but so does my dog's. After much research I decided on this container because it not only holds 3 to 5 days worth of food but it also has a separate water and food dish, all of which are compact and easy to clip to my bag. I can fill it with food at the begin of hurricane season and empty it at the end so that it is always ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Container
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this purchase. Packing food and bowls were always a pain and took up so much room in the dog bag. Now I can easily fit 4 days of kibble in the container and have bowls for water and food. I bought two of these so I have plenty of bowls for each. Vittles vault has been a favorite brand ever since I purchased the 40lb container, but this is a gem all of its own. Great design, easy to pack, easy to clean, can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling but not as completely expected
customer_reviews.text: I like that there is a bowl on both sides which can be used for food and water. Very easy to take apart and clean. Great for traveling. A little bigger then what we need but our dog is smaller. For a large dog, would be perfect. My only disappointment is the plastic which carries the food doesn't seem as sturdy as appears in photo. It's a thin lightweight plastic. The bowls attached to each end seem sturdy. Not sure if a person who has bigger dog would agree with my feelings about bowls. May prefer sturdier bowl for larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: this is a great container!
customer_reviews.text: it holds a couple of days worth of food for my dog (he's either a big-ish medium dog or a small-ish big dog, so if you have 12 labradors you might needs something a bit bigger). i love that it's two bowls and a container all in one, so i don't have to carry a bunch of extra stuff when we travel. also, i've got an ant problem at my house, but they've never been able to get inside this container which is extra awesome.
customer_reviews.author: kichi

customer_reviews.title: Great container with cups
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazingggggg. I am going camping and taking my dog and her food fits perfectly in it. The kibbles go in the container and the water can simple be placed in the cup. The other cup is able to hold extra water or the actual food as well. It is a decent size container enough for at least three days with 2x a day feeling. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for car travel
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very convenient. We have a 100lb+ dog, and this holds enough for two full days feeding. We just keep it in the back of the car when we are traveling, and feed our dog one cup for lunch. We use the other bowl for water which we take in a separate container. Works well. Cons: The plastic bowls and the plastic containers are difficult to separate when at the beach (sand), or when they get hot and expand. Overall, for the money, it's well worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: arizona golfer

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. I had a friend ask in a pet store for a "travel container" after she saw mine, and the lady told her to "pack tupperware." No way. Not after this handy little thing. The bowls on it are so convenient. I've used them even in situations that i didn't think I needed bowls. I remembered I had this and voila! It also is a decent size - not too big that it's annoying to carry, but holds just enough food for a few days. only when I've gone on a week trip or longer did i need to revert back to my old school zip-lock bag technique. It felt so primitive ;)
customer_reviews.author: S. Szymczak

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the price this would be well designed. The handle is flimsy, it twists off each time I use it and the unit just feels cheaply made. It will hold a decent amount of dog food and you can use one of the end cups for water if you bring it in a separate container. This does not hold water, just dry food.
customer_reviews.author: White Mountain customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Vittles Vault makes great products! I needed something even smaller than the Vittles Vault Jr. that I’ve used for years when traveling/working. This is perfect. Food container and water & food bowls all in one! Easy to use. Great for a small dog (animal) or maybe a meal or two for a large dog if you’re out for the day or overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Mae

customer_reviews.title: Handy Travel Container
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for car camping trips and overnight visits to friends' houses. It holds just enough food to take care of my pup for about three days. When he's grown, it'll probably be two, but he's a big dog. I actually like the bowls on the top and bottom more than the container itself. The "handle" that locks them on the container is plastic. You bend it to get them off. The bowls are sturdy; they've held up to his chewing with no problem. The container itself feels thin, but it held up to a drop from a picnic table. I'm pleased with the purchase and hope it lasts for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy N. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Really big!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add to our bug-out bag, to hold emergency food for our cat. It's huge! Takes up a lot of room in his little crate. I realized afterward that it's meant for dogs and is probably great for owners with mid-large size dogs. My fault for not noting any measurements, it looked smaller on the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Gaia Wild

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is composed of two blue plastic bowls that fit on the top and bottom of a clear plastic carrying container with a handle on the lid. The bowls are connected by a detachable handle. To fill the container, you detach the handle, remove the bowls, and unscrew the carrying container. I really only use the carrying container part, but I love it because it’s so convenient. Great for overnight trips.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Convenient. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely convenient for traveling. Very flimsy and cheapl material. I purchased to get us through normal road trips/ overnighters. I use vittle vaults larger airtight containers and this just isn’t the same quality. I wouldn’t trust taking this backpacking (needs to be airtight to not attract bears). Cool product, wish it was higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Functional and handy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's the perfect thing to keep in the car so if the pooch and I are ever away from home past dinnertime, I can feed him and he won't starve. It's also great for weekend road trips, as it holds quite a bit of kibble and has two bowls. The only thing I'd improve upon would be to somehow include a measuring cup in the design, but as it is I just keep my measuring cup buried inside the kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Davis

customer_reviews.title: wanted this to last
customer_reviews.text: I used like this but it is not very good quality left it in the shade in the car and came back and the clear plastic container was melted and no longer useable. During the few times I was able to use it before this happened I really did like it as it was plenty big for my dogs to enjoy drinks and snacks from
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This container is perfect for us. I travel every weekend and my dog always has his food and bowls all compacted in this nice container. The quality is great, he likes both bowls for weekend use, and it holds food for him for about 6 days if needed (he weighs 20 lbs) glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this for day hikes as well and I love how the dogs can't get it open in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for hiking because we could hang it with the bear container. I wish it was a little larger (its only one meal for all three of the pups) but it allows us to go on a trail overnight. We did have a black bear try to get it down, but didn't succeed. We have been using this for day hikes as well and I love how the dogs can't get it open in the vehicle if we aren't watching.
customer_reviews.author: sawoodhick

customer_reviews.title: Convienet feeding and watering on the go
customer_reviews.text: I take my Maltese with me pretty much everywhere and I have to take my elderly cat (14 yr) to the vet twice per year and this thing is literally the most convenient way of feeding and watering on the go and I have no idea why I didn't buy this sooner. The handle comes off nd the two blue parts are bowls (one food and one water) and the "canister" has a lid that unscrews. It would be wise to take a bottle of water with you if your destination does not have water fountains or sinks. I keep mine and a bottle of water in my car so I have it whenever I need it.
customer_reviews.author: aliensca13Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a 10 day vacation with my chihuahua and this worked perfect. I had just enough food for the trip. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the removable handle does not stay connected to the unit and I misplaced it as soon as I took it off. Im sure i will find it when I unpack. I lovef the convenience of the unit stayibg together even without tha handle.
customer_reviews.author: Darkthorn

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these already but purchased a 2nd since I have 3 dogs. They are very handy when we camp for just a few days. When I got it, my kiddo accidentally dropped it on the tile, and I figured for sure it cracked, but it held up! Surprisingly durable!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is MASSIVE. I bought it to easily transport my cat's dry food when he comes traveling with us. This container legitimately can hold a 3-month supply of his food. It's my fault -- I should have paid more attention to the dimensions. Was looking for something that would hold 1 weeks worth of cat food. Would probably good for a dog since their kibble is larger.
customer_reviews.author: KCW

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and great item would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.text: Does not leak,very durable,easy to clean,great for traveling. Would recommend buying this item. I purchased this so I could have a traveling container for cat food dog food and a bowl for water after I encountered three dogs tied up in bad weather and a kitten stuffed in a mailbox they were all hungry and thirsty so I bought this so I could always have a travel size amount of dog and cat food and a dish for water on me at all times it is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Tweedt-Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a little while
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I first bought them. I first made the mistake of putting the main container in the dishwasher. Although I don't use heat to dry, one warped and the other was fine. The other problem is that over time/use, the attachment handle no longer is tight enough to hold the 2 lids on or together. :( We melted one and shortened it. It looks awful, but actually still works.
customer_reviews.author: Calie

customer_reviews.title: For small/medium breed doggies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this “travel-tainer” for my dogs! I would only recommend this for small or medium breed dogs. My Labrador does not like it because it is too light for him and it moves everywhere when he is eating or drinking water. My other two small breeds (chihuahua and yorkie mut) have no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...
customer_reviews.text: Slow shipping. Purchased for trip and item didn’t arrive on time. Also clip on product looks like it will break easily. However, I have something else I can use for the clip so I’m still happy with the product. Other similar items are way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: VeXx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and will hold 11-12 cups of Orijen dog food. I usually just use a gallon sized ziplock bag to store our dog food when we travel. After a week of pulling the bag in and out of suitcases, the baggies usually ends up with a small hole. While my dogs LOVE their dog food,*I* don't love the smell. This container serves two functions: it holds enough dog food for our dogs for 2 weeks, keeps the odor in AND comes with two bowls. Just toss two leashes and a water bottle in a bag and the dogs are packed.
customer_reviews.author: PennyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Gamma Travel-Tainer
customer_reviews.text: We use the large Vittles Vault for my dog's bags of dog food. I was excited to try this smaller version for travel, and I am very pleased with how it works. The top and bottom detach to form bowls for food and water if needed. The container itself holds enough for several days' worth of food for my 50# dog. Great for trips out of town. Most importantly, it keeps the food fresh and the smell of the food out of the car while we're traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy access for daily cat feeding
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient size to use for daily cat feeding, while the big bag stays in a regular Vittles Vault to keep it fresh. This holds many days’ worth of dry kibble (even partially filled), and it’s easy to scoop from the wide opening. I leave the top bowl and handle off for easy access. Not nearly as rugged as the big Vittles Vaults, but the best option I’ve found for keeping dry food fresh for frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Carry
customer_reviews.text: We take our Boston Terrier, Ruby, with us when we travel. Rather than taking the dry food bag, we bought this item and it works great. Provides a food bowl, a water bowl and a container for the dog food. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so handy!!
customer_reviews.text: I've already taken it with me a couple of times! I put kibble and treats inside and since my dog is diabetic - I need to carry insulin too. It's so convenient to have everything in one container and then I just pop off the bowls when we get there! Super cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jill O.

customer_reviews.title: Careful of heat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I travel with my dog all the time and this holds a lot of food. However I left it in my car and it got warped by the heat, so the bowls don't fit snugly anymore and they fall off. I didn't see a warning against this sort of thing (but that doesn't mean it isn't there). Just don't leave it in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great, but don’t leave in car!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for travel and boarding needs. It holds one week if food for my fur-baby. If I had not left it in the car after returning from a trip, I would still be using the very first travel vaultI purchased almost 3 years ago. Sadly, it melted in the 100+ degree heat on summer. Shame on me!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: good travel piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for traveling. I gave it 3 stars because I let it soak in hot water and it malformed the jug part of it so it was rendered unusable. NOTE: do not put in dishwasher or very hot water. If you wash it in luke warm water it will be fine and it s great traveling tool.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This product is much larger than I expected. However, I have a 5 lb. chihuahua and this is the perfect weekend getaway doggy kitchen because it holds enough food (for a week for her, actually). Then the "lids" become the "bowls" for water & food. Would definitely recommend, although for some dogs it would be a daily ration.
customer_reviews.author: 4morales

customer_reviews.title: kind of an awkward thing
customer_reviews.text: The handle comes off when you pick it up...frustrating. I like the concept but feel there are better options. Won't bother to return it but with the handle situation won't bother with it again
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: not dishwasher safe, not a good value, try rubbermaids instead
customer_reviews.text: This item is not dishwasher safe. I did not know this! I was hoping it would be, but I guess handwashing is in the future. I bought this for my labrador for extended trips. It stores a large amount of food and is conveniently stacked with detachable bowls. It is actually pretty simple and value wise, not so great. If you think of it, a plain old set of two rubbermaid microwave containers stacked together with top one lidded and both containers rubber banded together (which isn't even necessary since stacking is good enough) would get the job done, at 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sun

customer_reviews.title: this holds a 1-2 week supply of dry cat food (assuming your cat eats about 1⁄2 cup a day like mine), and it's handy because it inc
customer_reviews.text: I know that people are buying this mostly for dogs, but I bought this for my cat when our apartment was fumigated and we had to travel for a few days. this holds a 2 week supply of dry cat food (assuming your cat eats about 1⁄2 cup a day like mine), and it's handy because it includes 2 feeding containers- 1 for water and 1 for dry food. each feeding container holds 3+ cups, which is more than enough for a cat or small dog. the cap is pretty airtight so the food stays fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Good product that needs one fix. The carry handle pops completely off to release the bowls, top and bottom. Then it promptly disappears. It needs to be attached to one of the bowls in some fashion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only?
customer_reviews.text: Hand wash only? This is a travel device. It was also very hard for me to open. I am 5’2” And could not open it it is so late at all. It is cheap so I will probably hold onto it for a shelter or a friend. I just can’t believe that it’s hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dogs, short trips
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 18-lb pug, and it's worked well for us. Pros: -The container is airtight. -This is good for weekend trips. -The bowls are deep enough where he can't slosh water out of them. -The rim is also wide enough for him to stick his entire face in and grab food (important for a flat-faced dog). -Good bargain. Cons: -I can't fit an entire 6-lb bag of dog food (maybe 2 lbs at most?). -The lightweight bowls can be tipped over easily. According to some of the other reviews, this isn't dishwasher-safe. I've never tried putting the bowls or container in the dishwasher anyway, so that isn't a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: MNC

customer_reviews.title: Great for weekend camping with dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and son in law. They go camping on weekends often with two dogs. This works great for their weekend dog food. Keeps fresh, dry and compact.
customer_reviews.author: JFCC

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: great to have the water bowl & food dish together with the food container. just wish the container was bigger as it's only 2 days worth for our dog, so we have to bring a different container with more food
customer_reviews.author: zoom zoom

customer_reviews.title: Not Dishwasher Safe
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom blue pieces are great. I was expecting a hard plastic material for the main cylinder that can hold water or dog kibble (I had one of these before somewhere else and that is how it came). Instead it is a softer plastic and expressly states that it is NOT machine washable. This makes me wonder if it is good plastic and safe for my dog to be drinking out of (but yeah... he also drinks off the sidewalk so this isn't that much of an issue). I just wish it was dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Evacuation Ready.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to add to our pet evacuation box. I can put a two day supply of dry dog food in and not have to dig out the larger supply except to refill before hitting the road again.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Krest

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Used it on a vacation for my dog and not only did it hold a great amount of food but it was so so convenient. Just grab a water bottle or find a water fountain, and fill up one of the bowls and food in the other. Very awesome
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This should serve my purposes just fine. I am going on a 5 day trip with my 32-lb (medium size) canine companion. He eats 3/4 cup of dry food for breakfast and 3/4 cup of dry food for dinner. That equals a total of 7.5 cups of (Natural Balance) dry food, which is EXACTLY what this Travel-tainer holds. If my dog were bigger, and/or the trip were longer, this one would be a no go. And I like that it comes with its own bowls for both the food and water. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Don't put it in the Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one I put the clear food container part on the top shelf of the dishwasher and it totally shrunk up like I put a torch to it. Other than being too lazy to wash it by hand it works great. It would be nice if it was d/w safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sally T.

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept... but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept and the size and the fact that it holds the food and the ends are 2 bowls.. but when I opened it there was some type of oily/greacey substance in it... it was really gross. I have it soaking in soapy water... hopefully it wasnt anything harmful. But yeah..
customer_reviews.author: Lexilex

customer_reviews.title: Love it but keeping track of the handle . . .
customer_reviews.text: I love this one but when you take the bowls off to use, there’s no where to keep the handle safe since it comes off both bowls. If you loose the handle, it ruins the entire unit. I have a puppy so leaving it near the bowls isn’t an option b/c he either will chew on it or pack it off.🐶
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Practical and useful...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to and is easy to use. I keep it in the car for emergency feedings. Our dog is over 50 pounds and is able to use this just fine.
customer_reviews.author: GoFastGirl

customer_reviews.title: A must for dog travels
customer_reviews.text: you really get a great item here.For your dog or cat, a bowl for water, a bowel for food. A carrier case for food. no mess, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon is Amazin

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little travel food and water bowl for your fur babys. Its very convent and easy to use. We love it! Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about 6 years now. Had to order another one because while camping in the woods I lost the handle. But I still Use it as a extra bin for more food. Prefect size for a 2 day trip for our husky
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Amazed with this thing
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this is a genius! We moved from California to Texas in a 26-feet rental truck and having food container, water and food bowls, all integrated into one easy-to-handle feeding system, was very helpful for our long trip. I even dropped it once on the concrete and it only got a couple of scratches, so the quality is pretty good for such an affordable item. I am very happy with my purchase and recommend this transportable feeding system a 100%.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set up. It’s perfect for traveling with dogs. This is the second one I purchased I liked it so well! The canister to hold food is a great size for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Looking Forward to Using!
customer_reviews.text: This Travel-tainer is great! I've just received it today and have been playing around with it. The bowls are a very good size for food and water, even for my Great Dane. The handle was a bit hard to put back on, but nothing too strenuous. We'll be taking this on a three day trip with our furbabies soon, and I think it should hold enough food for maybe two days (considering it's two dogs that have quite the appetite). I can update the review once we've had our trip to add any new developments or details.
customer_reviews.author: BoonahBaker

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first travel kit at TJ Maxx. It lasted 6 or so years. The handle broke. I was so happy to find this one. It makes traveling with your pet easy
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA AUDIA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put dog food in for our earthquake kit, very big, very sturdy! Love how you get two bowls out of it, perfect for my two dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect food travel kit for your companion
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I bring my cat with me when I stay at my boyfriends house for the weekend, and this is perfect for us. It stores about a week’s worth of food for her.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great container for travel.
customer_reviews.text: This container is perfect for a road trip. Do not need to use storage bags or lug a big dog food bag around.. You can use the lid as a bowl, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Runs tiny
customer_reviews.text: I have a small male cat with a long ruff. The Velcro sticks to his ruff and is not strong enough to prevent him from getting out of it. But it is comfortable, he won't fight it and is not bothered by it so it must feel ok to him, it needs stronger Velcro and longer Velcro for a more secure method .
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Works for short trips
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, we use it for short trips and daycare so we don't have to waste baggies. One thing that would make it way more convenient is if the "bowls" bowed out like actual bowls so you could stack them in one hand. Obviously that's minor but it can be a pain
customer_reviews.author: daniTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made-no problems
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this travel container. We have a 10 lb dog and this container will feed him 12-14 days. We have been using it consistently for 7 months. No problems with the handle breaking. My only suggestion for future models would be to weight the bowls a little bit as the bowl will slide on the floor a bit. I would still recommend. It is durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product that far exceeded my expectations. Since this purchase I have traveled with it multiple times without an issue and feel like it will last a long time as it's sturdy materials. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Must have dog product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Holds a large amount of food for travel/camping/ long days. Very study. Super convenient for having in the car. Always have both a good food and water bowl for all situations.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S

customer_reviews.title: It's great if you're traveling with one dog or maybe 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great if you're traveling with one dog or maybe 2 for a couple of days, but if I travel with more than one of my medium sized dogs, it's not quite big enough. I have 3 English Setters and a Border Collie. I took it to a dog show with 2 of my setters and it was good for both of them for 2 days, but any longer than that and I would need a second one. It's very handy though, enough bowls for everyone and I like having the handle on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tam2dogs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Yes, you need it
customer_reviews.text: Seriously qhere was this stupidly brilliant thing for the last four years of my dog parenthood. I carried my dogs food in nasty plastic bags that would rip, and have to scrounge for bowls i could use when traveling. This thing fixed all that. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erised

customer_reviews.title: Like the concept.
customer_reviews.text: I kind the concept—a place to store food along with a serving container. However, I was surprised at how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: Hometown Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Food Container!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot with my dog and I have been looking at a product like this for awhile. I absolutely love this. It is very compact and the handle easily comes off to reveal two bowls (food and water), as well as a food holder. I will definitely be using this in the future and love that it is all together. I highly recommend for anyone who is going to be traveling anywhere with their pet, no matter how short or long of a journey it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: So convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling!! I have food and bowls ready to go. So convenient. My friend had one for her girls and loved it. So then I needed one for my boys too.
customer_reviews.author: Bogey Babe

customer_reviews.title: Great for trips!
customer_reviews.text: Great travel container! Use this for my 2 dog babies (chocolate lab mix and blue pit). The blue one also loves running around with the little bowls in her mouth just for fun. Carries a decent amount of food, has a quality seal, and it is convenient that it comes with 2 bowls so that one can be used for food and the other for water. The handle works well, clips the set up together without a problem. 5 stars :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazoni Customeri

customer_reviews.title: I like the size for my  medium size dog
customer_reviews.text: I like the size for my medium-sized dog so on a trip to visit family. I don't have to hunt for a bowl for food and water, and then try to fill a plastic bag with food. Then try not to miss place or hunt them in my trunk. Then while I there at family hope the bag does not spill or torn. When on the road it is easy to feed and water him on a stop
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice size, holds 4 days worth of kibble for my 55lb dog. Feels very sturdy, no problem there and fits in luggage without smelling bad. Warning! Don't wash in dishwasher unless the heat dry is turned off!!! It melted badly. My fault. It felt sturdy enough but it wasn't. :-(
customer_reviews.author: FactChecker

customer_reviews.title: Convenient product!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can just toss kibble and treats in the same jar and have the food/water bowls ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lam

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Combine this with a water bottle and you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Combine this with a water bottle and you have a great meal and drinks on the go. I really love this design. It's super compact and perfect traveling. The handle pops off nice and easy and provides 2 bowls for either 2 dogs or food and water for 1. I also love the size of this container. It's nice and big and holds quite a lot of food. This is great, I can tote this around in my car and always have 2 or 3 meals ready for my pup!
customer_reviews.author: Tolopka

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stick the container in the dishwasher - it will literally shrink.
customer_reviews.text: Our container literally shrunk when we washed it. Meaning the handle won’t hold the two bowls together anymore. Hoping we can get a replacement container to fix this. Cool concept, just wish the interior plastic bin was made with better quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Chanoochi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic I love this because it comes with the bowls and keeps food air tight I travel with my service dog and this product is incredible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great option for traveling with pets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for traveling with pets. Had two bowls and I’m thinking it will hold 3-4 days of food for my full size Labrador. Build quality is great and the price was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Traveling with a Pet
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and convenient. It held enough dog food and treats to last over a 10 day trip. Moreover, my mini-daschund (otherwise known as the Dog Who's Always Hungry) tried unsuccessfully to break into the container--she did manage to get the handle off (no small feat.). She did not damage anything, so I can attest that the Travel-tainer is officially daschund-proof. It is also well-designed and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ladanye

customer_reviews.title: Do not put in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product for the convenience but made the mistake of putting in the dishwasher so it melted. This was a replacement purchase.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Great for my dogs food when we went camping. You have their food and dishes in one place, very handy and no critters or bugs got in.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Complete Dog Food Packaging
customer_reviews.text: We were evacuated twice recently during the Carr Fire here in No. California. I packed this Vittles Vault Travel contained and had enough to last us during our camp out, and bowls for both the water and the food.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy item.
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Holds a little over six cups of my dogs food. Compact & appears to be well built. Easy to clean too. We are using it as an 'emergency ready' pack, just in case. In the meantime, we are using it on trips that include our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, durable and nifty.
customer_reviews.text: So so nifty! I use it more for a treat holder and the two bowls on the end for water for my dogs when I walk but either way, it's perfect for travelling with my dogs. Very durable. Has dropped countless times with no cracks and my dogs have tried their best to chew the bowls apart with no luck. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: mints

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Can't wait to use it when I go camping this summer. No more ripped ziploc bags of dog food! EDIT: took it camping and it worked great expected, so convenient the raccoons helped themselves to it. Carried it away and only the handle was left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT pet travel container! We have two Yorkies; this container has come in handy so often as we camp a lot with our horses and dogs. Two bowls, which, in our case is just right. We use one for water, and the other for their food since they have no problem sharing. Very well-made product, too!! Lightweight, and the handle is easily put on and taken off; very convenient!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs approved
customer_reviews.text: Take this container every time we are going traveling even if it’s a short trip happy to know my dogs have food and water within their own bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than appears in photos
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Much bigger than I was expecting. Holds approx. 6 cups of food. Roughly 5 in diameter, 7 in tall. I have a little 5lb chihuahua, so this is a little bigger than I was looking for, but will be perfect for camping or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: Good for day hikes for a medium sized dog
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it when I go on day hikes with my dog. It stores more than enough food to keep him satisfied for the day and having an extra bowl for water is a big plus. The product is made up of durable plastic and I have dropped it multiple times cement, gravel, rocks\boulders, and dirt and it has held up great. The handle is easy to take off and works very well. My dog is happy and so am I
customer_reviews.author: EJ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect! I love it. Its Sri covenant and easy to use. I have a small dog. So it Carrys enough for several feedings and a small bag of treats. I put a small bottle of water, a bag of treats and still have plenty of room for his food. I defanently recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good product for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times and it works great! I wish it held a little more food but we have a big dog so she needs more food than most!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well built , easy to clean , travel food carrier for the my pet for a day or two.Comes very handy , sturdy , don’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a week long trip and it was worth it. When I first received them in the mail, I was surprised at the size since they did not look that big in the pictures. I was able to fit plenty of food for my 11lb Yorkie, yes he's a bigger sized Yorkie, to feed him for a week. I would just have to feed him enough food to cover the bottom of the bowl since they are big bowls. The container is very durable we have not had any issues with it and recommend it to anyone traveling.
customer_reviews.author: JennM369

product_meta.title: Gamma2 Vittles Vault Pet Food Travel-Tainer Kit
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueVittles Vault Pet Food Travel-Tainer Kit, Blue

AMAZON.COM


GAMMA2 VITTLES VAULT TRAVEL-TAINERS
Pets come in all shapes and sizes and so do pet food containers. That's why we created the Vittles Vault Choice line - bringing you the same quality as the Vittles Vault Prime line plus several unique features for challenging storage areas, travel and for fun! A three piece stroage and feeding system in one! Airtight seal locks in flavor and freshness. Let your pet get the most from their meal!

 * Airtight - Keeps Food Fresh

 * Complete Transportable Pet Feeding System

 * Easy Meals on the Go

 * Spin On / Off lid

 * Food Grade Plastic

 * Compact Design (Transforms in seconds)

 * Available in Blue or Pink

MADE FROM CLEARIFIED POLYPROPYLENE AND HIGH DENSITY POLYETHYLENE, FDA APPROVED FOOD GRADE PLASTIC. BPA FREE.
We care about the safety and storage of food, for people and pets! Vittles Vaults are completely recyclable.

We care about the safety and storage of food, for people and pets! Vittles Vaults are completely recyclable.

Important Note: The colored bowls are dishwasher safe...the clear plastic container IS NOT! Only wash the clear container by hand.

Replacement "C" connector available online
feature_bullets: PORTABLE PET FOOD CONTAINER: This dry pet food container is perfect for keeping food fresher while on walks & vacations. The top & bottom portions are removable & can be used as food & water bowls.

AIRTIGHT FOOD STORAGE: Ideal for road trips, camping, doggie daycare & more. The BPA-free food container is made of food grade plastic for safety & freshness. Holds 6 cups of food in storage. Bowls hold 3 cups of food/water.

FOOD & WATER: Keep pets fed with fresh food & water with a variety of our products. Check out our airtight dry food storage containers, bowls for kennels, gravity water bowls, automated food bowls & travel accessories.

GAMMA2: Dog & cat dry food stays fresh & nutritious with our collection of airtight food containers. Features wall mounted containers, travel containers, pantry & kitchen containers & even larger containers for large dogs & horses.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!
